ComicInfo.Summary: FDA Agent Tony Chu just landed the biggest bust of his career, but while the bullets were flying and the bodies were falling, Tony's partner Mason Savoy took a slug. Now, Tony's on his own, and he just ate something that's revealed the identity of a dangerous enemy-- the absolute last person Tony should be facing without backup. The stunningly violent conclusion to first story arc of the surprise hit of the season-- and just maybe the very best comic you will read all month about cops, crooks, cooks, cannibals & clairvoyants!
ComicInfo.Tags: Tony Chu,Taster's Choice,Food and Drug Administration,Chow Chu,Pennsylvania,Evan Pepper,Mason Savoy,Philadelphia
ComicInfo.Title: Taster's Choice, Part. 5 of 5
